description: A jnxVpnIfUp notification is generated when the interface
with index jnxVpnIfIndex belonging to the VPN named jnxVpnIfVpnName
of type jnxVpnIfVpnType transitions out of the 'down' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfUp JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnType i 1 JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfIndex u 9999

description: Type of the VPN to which this interface belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnType

description: Name of the VPN to which this interface belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnName

description: The index of this interface in the VPN. Each interface
in the VPN is given a unique index. The RowStatus says
whether a given interface (i.e., a row in this table)
is valid or not. Note: this index MUST NOT be zero.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfIndex

description: A jnxVpnIfDown notification is generated when the interface
with index jnxVpnIfIndex belonging to the VPN named jnxVpnIfVpnName
of type jnxVpnIfVpnType transitions to the 'down' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfDown JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnType i 1 JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfIndex u 9999

description: Type of the VPN to which this interface belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnType

description: Name of the VPN to which this interface belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfVpnName

description: The index of this interface in the VPN. Each interface
in the VPN is given a unique index. The RowStatus says
whether a given interface (i.e., a row in this table)
is valid or not. Note: this index MUST NOT be zero.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnIfIndex

description: A jnxVpnPwUp notification is generated when the Pseudo-Wire
with index jnxVpnPwIndex belonging to the VPN named jnxVpnPwVpnName
of type jnxVpnPwVpnType transitions out of the 'down' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwUp JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnType i 1 JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwIndex u 9999

description: The type of the VPN to which this Pseudo-Wire belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnType

description: The name of the VPN to which this Pseudo-Wire belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnName

description: The index of this Pseudo-Wire in the VPN. Each Pseudo
Wire in the VPN is given a unique index. The RowStatus
says whether a given Pseudo Wire (i.e., a row in this
table) is valid or not. Note: this index MUST NOT be zero.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwIndex

description: A jnxVpnPwDown notification is generated when the Pseudo-Wire
with index jnxVpnPwIndex belonging to the VPN named jnxVpnPwVpnName
of type jnxVpnPwVpnType transitions to the 'down' state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwDown JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnType i 1 JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwIndex u 9999

description: The type of the VPN to which this Pseudo-Wire belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnType

description: The name of the VPN to which this Pseudo-Wire belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-VPN-MIB::jnxVpnPwVpnName

description: The index of this Pseudo-Wire in the VPN. Each Pseudo
Wire in the VPN is given a unique index. The RowStatus
says whether a given Pseudo Wire (i.e., a row in this
table) is valid or not. Note: this index MUST NOT be zero.
